scripts.prod:each: lerna run prod && npm run test:build
scripts.demo: yarn run examples && cd ./demo/ && yarn run build && yarn run docker
scripts.publish: npm run test:build && lerna publish from-package
scripts.patch: npm run test:build && lerna version patch --conventional-commits -m "chore(release): publish %s" --no-push --create-release github
scripts.minor: npm run test:build && lerna version minor --conventional-commits -m "chore(release): publish %s" --no-push --create-release github
scripts.prerelease: npm run test:build && lerna version --conventional-commits --conventional-prerelease -m "chore(release): publish %s" --no-push --create-release github
